amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Southwest Border Prosecutor Initiative by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce appropriations (by transfer) for the Periodic Censuses and Programs by $10 million, and increase appropriations for the Office of Justice Programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capito amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 229 - 196 (Roll no. 722).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mrs. Capito.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Capito amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 229 - 196 (Roll no. 722).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
